thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Carrie
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Carrie

author: Carrie
title: Carrie
text: I ordered an engraved baptism gift from Things Engraved that was sent directly to family in another Province. I found the engraving charge a little expensive but the gift was perfect. It arrived engraved, wrapped and on time. There are many different gift options for different occasions. I was very happy with my online shopping experience.
